props.description: The width property specifies the width of a box's content area.
props.title: width

props.description: The height property specifies the height of a box's content area.
props.title: height

props.description: The max width property specifies the width of a box's content area.
props.title: maxWidth

props.description: The max height property specifies the height of a box's content area.
props.title: maxHeight

props.description: The min width property specifies the width of a box's content area.
props.title: minWidth

props.description: The min height property specifies the height of a box's content area.
props.title: minHeight

props.description: The bottom property participates in setting the vertical position of a positioned box.
props.title: bottom

props.description: The left property participates in specifying the horizontal position of a positioned box.
props.title: left

props.description: The right property participates in specifying the horizontal position of a positioned box.
props.title: right

props.description: The top property participates in setting the vertical position of a positioned box.
props.title: top

props.description: This is the shorthand for flexGrow, flexShrink and flexBasis combined.
props.title: flex

props.description: This defines the ability for a flex item to shrink if necessary.
props.title: flexShrink

props.description: This defines the ability for a flex item to grow if necessary.
props.title: flexGrow

props.description: The flexWrap property sets whether flex items are forced onto one line or can wrap onto multiple lines.
props.title: flexWrap

props.description: The order property controls the order in which they appear in a flex container.
props.title: order

props.description: The gridTemplateColumns property defines the line names and track sizing functions of the grid columns.
props.title: gridTemplateColumns

props.description: The gridTemplateAreas property specifies named grid areas, establishing the cells in the grid and assigning them names.
props.title: gridTemplateAreas

props.description: The gridTemplateRows property defines the line names and track sizing functions of the grid rows.
props.title: gridTemplateRows

props.description:
The gridArea shorthand property specifies a grid item's size and location within a grid by contributing a line,
a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the edges of its grid area.
props.title: gridArea

props.description:
The display property sets whether an box is treated as a block or inline element and the layout used for its children,
such as grid or flex.
props.title: display

props.description:
The justifyContent property defines how the browser distributes space between and around content items along
the main-axis of a flex container, and the inline axis of a grid container.
props.title: justifyContent

props.description: The flexDirection property sets how flex items are placed in the flex container defining the main axis and the direction.
props.title: flexDirection

props.description:
The alignItems property sets the align-self value on all direct children as a group. In Flexbox, it controls the alignment of items on the Cross Axis.
In Grid Layout, it controls the alignment of items on the Block Axis within their grid area.
props.title: alignItems

props.description:
The alignSelf property overrides a grid or flex item's align-items value. In Grid, it aligns the item inside the grid area.
In Flexbox, it aligns the item on the cross axis.
props.title: alignSelf

props.description: The gap property sets the gaps between rows and columns. It is a shorthand for rowGap and columnGap.
props.title: gap

props.description: The gridGap property sets the gaps between rows and columns. It is a shorthand for rowGap and columnGap.
props.title: gridGap

props.description: The pointerEvents property sets under what circumstances (if any) a particular graphic element can become the target of pointer events.
props.title: pointerEvents

props.description: The position property sets how an box is positioned in a document.
props.title: position

props.description: The overflow shorthand property sets the desired behavior for an box's overflow.
props.title: overflow

props.description: The overflow-x property sets what shows when content overflows a block-level box's left and right edges.
props.title: overflowX

props.description: The overflow-y property sets what shows when content overflows a block-level box's top and bottom edges.
props.title: overflowY

props.description: The cursor property sets the mouse cursor, if any, to show when the mouse pointer is over an box.
props.title: cursor

props.description: The backgroundColor property sets the background color of the box.
props.title: backgroundColor

props.description: The color property is used to set the color of the box.
props.title: color

props.description: The borderRadius property rounds the corners of an box's outer border edge.
props.title: borderRadius

props.description: The borderWidth property sets the width of an box's border.
props.title: borderWidth

props.description: The borderTopWidth property defines the width of the border at the top of a box.
props.title: borderTopWidth

props.description: The borderBottomWidth property defines the width of the border at the bottom of a box.
props.title: borderBottomWidth

props.description: The borderLeftWidth property defines the width of the border at the left of a box.
props.title: borderLeftWidth

props.description: The borderRightWidth property defines the width of the border at the right of a box.
props.title: borderRightWidth

props.description: The borderWidthX shorthand property defines the width of the element's border on the left and right.
props.title: borderWidthX

props.description: The borderWidthY shorthand property defines the width of the element's border on the top and bottom.
props.title: borderWidthY

props.description: The borderColor property sets the color of the box's four borders.
props.title: borderColor

props.description: borderStyle property sets the line style for all four sides of an box's border.
props.title: borderStyle

props.description: The boxSizing property sets how the total width and height of an box is calculated.
props.title: boxSizing

props.description: The boxShadow property adds shadow effects around an box's frame.
props.title: boxShadow

props.description: The padding properties are used to generate space around an box's content area.
props.title: padding

props.description: The paddingTop property sets the height of the padding area on the top of an box.
props.title: paddingTop

props.description: The paddingBottom property sets the height of the padding area on the bottom of an box.
props.title: paddingBottom

props.description: The paddingLeft property sets the width of the padding area to the left of an box.
props.title: paddingLeft

props.description: The paddingLeft property sets the width of the padding area to the right of an box.
props.title: paddingRight

props.description: The margin shorthand property sets the margin area on all four sides of an box.
props.title: margin

props.description: The marginTop property sets the margin area on the top of an box.
props.title: marginTop

props.description: The marginBottom property sets the margin area on the bottom of an box.
props.title: marginBottom

props.description: The marginLeft property sets the margin area on the left side of an box.
props.title: marginLeft

props.description: The marginRight property sets the margin area on the right side of an box.
props.title: marginRight

props.description: The transitionTimingFunction property sets how intermediate values are calculated for CSS properties being affected by a transition effect.
props.title: transitionTimingFunction

props.description: The transitionProperty property sets the CSS properties to which a transition effect should be applied.
props.title: transitionProperty

props.description: The transitionDelay property specifies the duration to wait before starting a property's transition effect when its value changes.
props.title: transitionDelay

props.description: The transitionDuration property sets the length of time a transition animation should take to complete. By default, the value is 0s, meaning that no animation will occur.
props.title: transitionDuration

props.description: The zIndex property specifies the stack order of the box.
props.title: zIndex

props.description: The backgroundImage property sets one or more background images on an element.
props.title: backgroundImage

props.description:
The backgroundPosition property sets the initial position for each background image.
The position is relative to the position layer set by background-origin.
props.title: backgroundPosition

props.description:
The backgroundBlendMode property sets how an element's background images should blend with each
other and with the element's background color.
props.title: backgroundBlendMode

props.description: The backgroundRepeat property sets how background images are repeated. A background image can be repeated along the horizontal and vertical axes, or not repeated at all.
props.title: backgroundRepeat

props.description: The textDecoration shorthand property sets the appearance of decorative lines on text.
props.title: textDecoration

props.description: The backgroundSize property sets the size of the element's background image. The image can be left to its natural size, stretched, or constrained to fit the available space.
props.title: backgroundSize

props.description: The p shorthand property sets the margin area on all four sides of an box.
props.title: p

props.title: pl

props.description: The paddingX shorthand property defines the width of the left and right padding area of a box.

props.description: The paddingY pt shorthand property sets the height of the padding area at the top and bottom of a box.
